Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Insert Image into Excel doesn't seems to work anymore." (#1757) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Describe the bug**
I have tried all samples / methods that I can find in the web, but none is working. All results are either the image missing or Excel throw error when opening.

**To Reproduce**

Use this sample below, easy to follow.

https://github.com/microsoftarchive/msdn-code-gallery-microsoft/tree/master/OneCodeTeam/How%20to%20insert%20image%20into%20Excel%20using%20Open%20XML%20SDK/%5BC%23%5D-How%20to%20insert%20image%20into%20Excel%20using%20Open%20XML%20SDK/C%23

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Make LINQ classes partial" (#1756) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Merged pull request "Bump gittools/actions from 1 to 2" (#1753) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Bumps [gittools/actions](https://github.com/gittools/actions) from 1 to 2.
Release notes

Sourced from gittools/actions's releases.

v2.0.0

What's Changed

  • Refactor the implementation of the build infrastructure to use vite by @​arturcic in GitTools/actions#1156
  • Bump eslint-plugin-github from 4.10.2 to 5.0.1 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1157
  • Bump vitest from 1.6.0 to 2.0.1 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1160
  • Bump vite-node from 1.6.0 to 2.0.1 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1158
  • Bump eslint-plugin-n from 16.6.2 to 17.9.0 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1161
  • Bump @​typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 6.21.0 to 7.16.0 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1159
  • Bump vitest from 2.0.1 to 2.0.2 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1167
  • Bump eslint-plugin-vitest from 0.4.1 to 0.5.4 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1168
  • Bump eslint-config-love from 54.0.0 to 56.0.0 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1169
  • Bump prettier from 3.3.2 to 3.3.3 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1170
  • Bump vitest from 2.0.2 to 2.0.3 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1171
  • Bump @​typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 7.16.0 to 7.16.1 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1174
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.14.10 to 20.14.11 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1175
  • Bump vite from 5.3.3 to 5.3.4 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1176
  • Bump semver from 7.6.2 to 7.6.3 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1177
  • Bump eslint-plugin-prettier from 5.1.3 to 5.2.1 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1178
  • Bump eslint-plugin-promise from 6.4.0 to 6.6.0 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1179

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GitTools/actions/compare/v1.2.0...v2.0.0

v1.2.0

What's Changed

  • docs: error in gitversion execute usage example by @​x-delfino in GitTools/actions#1124
  • Refactoring by @​arturcic in GitTools/actions#1152
  • #1137 - use milestone for the action field for every GRM actions by @​arturcic in GitTools/actions#1154
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.11.26 to 20.11.27 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1096

  • Bump webpack from 5.90.3 to 5.91.0 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1103
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.11.29 to 20.11.30 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1101
  • Bump reflect-metadata from 0.2.1 to 0.2.2 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1104
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.11.30 to 20.12.2 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1105
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.12.2 to 20.12.3 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1106
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.12.3 to 20.12.4 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1107
  • Bump typescript from 5.4.3 to 5.4.4 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1108
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.12.4 to 20.12.5 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1109
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.12.5 to 20.12.6 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1111
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.12.6 to 20.12.7 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1112
  • Bump typescript from 5.4.4 to 5.4.5 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1114
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.12.7 to 20.12.11 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1120
  • Bump validator from 13.11.0 to 13.12.0 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1119
  • Bump semver from 7.6.0 to 7.6.2 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1121
  • Bump @​types/node from 20.12.11 to 20.12.12 by @​dependabot in GitTools/actions#1123

... (truncated)

Commits
  • b8bc16a switch to production release
  • 136b869 Merge pull request #1179 from GitTools/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/eslint-plugin-...
  • c33ec7b Bump eslint-plugin-promise from 6.4.0 to 6.6.0
  • f78a8e6 show test summary in Azure Pipelines
  • 9f8d3c8 show test summary in GitHub Actions
  • 6806c47 include tests as part of the pipeline run
  • d2ae1e9 fail if eslint or prettier check fail
  • 4876f38 Merge pull request #1178 from GitTools/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/eslint-plugin-...
  • 84f2c25 Bump eslint-plugin-prettier from 5.1.3 to 5.2.1
  • bd83f33 dist update
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=gittools/actions&package-manager=github_actions&previous-version=1&new-version=2)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)
